name: MIDICIDiscoveredNode
desc: A discovered MIDI-CI node that represents a MIDI source and destination that respond to capability inquiries.

items.name: var supportsProfiles: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this node supports MIDI-CI profiles.

items.name: var supportsProperties: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this node supports MIDI-CI properties.

items.name: var maximumSysExSize: NSNumber
items.desc: The maximum size of a System Exclusive (SysEx) message this node supports.
